com.navis.framework.presentation.charting

Class PresentationChartConsts

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navis.framework.presentation.charting.PresentationChartConsts

  • public final class PresentationChartConsts
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains constants used for charts in the presentation layer.
    Author:
    Gisella Saavedra, Jun 24, 2011

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_BACKGROUND
      background is the attribute used for describing a color background.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_GADGET_TABLE_VIEW_PROPS
      gadgetTableViewProps is the attribute used internally to store gadget tableView properties passed at runtime.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_GAUGE_TYPE
      gaugeType is the attribute used to describe the type of gauge chart, whether an arc (default) or meter.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_IGNORE_TACIT_COLOR_THEME
      ignoreTacitColorTheme is the attribute used to ignore underlying color scheme as specified in fields associated with Enum values.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_IGNORE_TITLE_AND_LABELS
      ignoreTitleAndLabels is a run-time boolean attribute used to indicate whether to ignore chart title and labels.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_LABEL
      label is a generic attribute used to hold the text for, e.g., axis names.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_LEGEND_POSITION
      legendPosition is the attribute used to describe the position of the legend in a chart.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_LOWER_BOUND
      lowerBound is the attribute used to hold the value of a lower bound.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_MAX_THRESHOLD
      maxThreshold is the attribute used to hold the value of a maximum threshold.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_MIN_THRESHOLD
      minThreshold is the attribute used to hold the value of a minimum threshold.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_NO_DATA_MSG
      noDataMessage is the attribute used for providing color and font to display hte NO DATA text when no data is present.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_SERIES
      series is the attribute used to provide, e.g., color information for a series.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_SORT_ORDER
      sortOrder is the attribute used to describe the sort order of the chart data.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_TABLE_VIEW_CONTROLLERS
      tableViewControllers is a run-time attribute used to indicate the table controllers from that are applied to the their Gadget UI.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_TARGET_VALUE
      targetValue is the attribute used to define the desired target value for a Bullet Chart.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_TICK
      tick id the attribute used to define a font for the tick.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_TIME_TICK
      timeTick is the attribute used to define a date time tick object.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_TIME_TICK_FORMAT
      timeTickFormat is the attribute used to define a Java format for a date time tick.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_TITLE
      title is the attribute used to define properties for the chart title, e.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_UPPER_BOUND
      upperBound is the attribute used to hold the value of an upper bound.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_VALUE
      value is the attribute used to hold the current value of a Bullet or Gauge chart.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_VALUE_ANNOTATION
      valueAnnotation is the attribute used to hold unit context to a Gauge chart value.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_VALUE_INDICATOR
      valueIndicator is the attribute used to indicate the color for the value indicator in a Bullet chart.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_VALUES
      values is the attribute used to indicate the value map for a series in the ScatterPlot chart.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIB_VARIFORM_ID
      variformId is the attribute to indicate the ID of the gadget chart.
      static int DEFAULT_CHART_ICON_HEIGHT
      Default chart icon height, used when displaying a chart in a table or form view.
      static int DEFAULT_CHART_ICON_WIDTH
      Default chart icon width, used when displaying a chart in a table or form view.
      static int DEFAULT_IMAGE_ICON_HEIGHT
      Default icon height, used when displaying an icon.
      static int DEFAULT_IMAGE_ICON_WIDTH
      Default icon width, used when displaying an icon.

      • ATTRIB_TABLE_VIEW_CONTROLLERS

        public static final java.lang.String ATTRIB_TABLE_VIEW_CONTROLLERS
        tableViewControllers is a run-time attribute used to indicate the table controllers from that are applied to the their Gadget UI. One usage of this attribute is to find the right table view when refresh is needed on the gadget lov selection.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ATTRIB_IGNORE_TITLE_AND_LABELS

        public static final java.lang.String ATTRIB_IGNORE_TITLE_AND_LABELS
        ignoreTitleAndLabels is a run-time boolean attribute used to indicate whether to ignore chart title and labels. Used for displaying charts within a table view.

        Constant Field Values
